headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts in GTA Online
content:
Enjoy steep savings on the FH-1 Hunter and select Vehicle Upgrades designed to turbo charge your arsenal of vehicles. Plus, take advantage of discounts on:

Fort Zancudo Hangar A2 – 50% off
Special Cargo Warehouses – 50% off
Aquarius Yacht – 30% off
Arcadius Business Center – 30% off

And more. Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
